reviewtext: These actually have a really nice sound to them, out of 4 sets of headphones I got at the same time (2 Koss 1JBuds) they were pretty close to being the best....both in sound and comfort.  Unfortunately, the connection to my Sansa Clip+ isn't great.  It's the only set that has an L Shaped plug and I don't know if that has anything to do with it, but if I move around at all there is static or loss of volume or both.
